Holobiont Modelling Framework

Holobiont Modelling Framework

William S. Pearman, Allen G. Rodrigo, Anna W. Santure

2024-11-03

1 About

This site is an introduction to the modelling framework developed by William Pearman, Allen Rodrigo, and Anna Santure. This site will be an ‘evolving’ document, where as we develop extensions to the framework - we will add extra chapters.
